summary: A suite of unit tests for auxiliary components of a diffusion model library, covering copy detection, dummy data helpers, configuration mixins, dependency checks, exponential moving average logic, model card generation, image and video preprocessing utilities, output configuration objects, training pipeline behavior, and deprecation handling.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of supporting utilities and infrastructure in the diffusion framework to prevent regressions, ensure proper integration, and maintain developer confidence during development and release cycles.
